import React, { Component } from "react"; import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import validateProperty from "../App.js" class SignUp extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); const user = localStorage.getItem("user"); if (user) { this.props.history.push("/home"); } this.state = { user: { firstName: "", lastName: "", dob: "", email: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "", phone: "", gender: "", }, errors: {}, }; } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { user } = this.state; Object.keys(user).forEach((field) => this.validateProperty.bind(field, user[field]) ); if (!Object.keys(this.state.errors).length) { this.props.addUser(this.state.user); } }; render() { return ( <>

SIGN UP

this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> {this.state.errors["firstName"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> {this.state.errors["lastName"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> Format: 1234567890
{this.state.errors["phone"]}
{this.state.errors["gender"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> {this.state.errors["dob"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> Email must be example@example.example
{this.state.errors["email"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> Password must be at least 8 characters long and must contains 1 lowercase character, 1 uppercase character, 1 numeric character and 1 special character !@#$%^&*.
{this.state.errors["password"]}
this.validateProperty.bind(e.target.name, e.target.value) } className="form-control" /> {this.state.errors["confirmPassword"]}
); } } export default withRouter(SignUp);
